mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spd_his_mzsf( fsf_brid, fsf_yjxh, fsf_jzxh, fsf_xmbh, fsf_mc, fsb_sl, fsb_je, fsf_kd_ks, fsf_zx_ks, Fsf_rq, Fsb_ry, fsf_zt, Fsf_XH ) VALUES ( #{item.fsfBrId}, #{item.fsfYjxh}, #{item.fsfJzxh}, #{item.fsfXmbh}, #{item.fsfMc}, #{item.fsbSl}, #{item.fsbJe}, #{item.fsfKdKs}, #{item.fsfZxKs}, #{item.fsfRq}, #{item.fsbRy}, #{item.fsbZt}, #{item.fsbXh} )
